verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
All the way to Calvary
He went for me (3x)

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
All the way to Calvary
He went for me
He died and set me free

verse.name: v3a
verse.lines:
Although I had so many, many sins
Jesus washes them all away
And he pardons me. (2x)

verse.name: v3b
verse.lines: He died and SET ME FREE!
